website_summaries.verdict: If you need a set of packing cubes in matching medium sizes, this is the best choice.
pros: Large mesh top allows user to identify contents
Double-zipper pulls for secure opening and closing
cons: The zippers are not as durable as the other models we tested

customer_reviews.title: Very very useful!!
customer_reviews.text: These will be perfect for travel. I already have a few other packing cubes so these will fill the gaps. My only wish is that there was one half or a third the size of the smallest one, small ones are useful too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: Good variety, zipper could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Would probably give them 5 stars if I didn't already have eBags packing cubes. These Amazon ones are slightly inferior. The zipper isn't as smooth and it's harder to grasp. Seems petty but when it comes to packing, I'm constantly grabbing the eBags over these. My eBags are also in a variety of colors too - these are boring black. That said, these come with 4 cubes and for the same price, you'll only get 3 eBags cubes. I'm glad I got them (as with most AmazonBasics products) but they are basic (duh).
customer_reviews.author: Curtis A

customer_reviews.title: Should have spent the money on the higher quality set.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cheaper than the eBags version, but a much lower quality. Some bags have only been used 1 time and the zipper is pulling away from the fabric. Love the way they pack into suitcase and keep everything organized. Should have spent the money on the higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: HuskerinIowa

customer_reviews.title: Rivals eBags...except for the zipper pull.
customer_reviews.text: I have lived off of the eBags brand of packing cubes for years. For a much better price, these are absolutely comparable to the eBags brand. The only thing I do not enjoy about the AmazonBasics brand is the zipper pull. It feels a bit cheap and it's small. Nonetheless, I imagine that I'll begin to purchase these over the eBags brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: choirnerd

customer_reviews.title: So, I used two of these just this weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I used two of these just this weekend. I wasn't very tough on them and both of them one of the zippers cam off track. Very disappointing product. I would maybe pay a little more for a similar product. Maybe I should have bought the AmazonTough product? Not sure... :(
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, oddly sized
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality - thin material that held no shape and wasn't particularly light either. And not sized well to fit in any suitcase we own. Competing brands size the cubes to fit side by side or the full width of a mid-sized suitcase so that they are easily stack-able. The sizes complement each other and simplify packing. These are just randomly sized and made packing a bag much harder.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Most Likely a Used Set
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly certain the set I received is a used set. It smells like fried food. I am going to try to wash the set and be done with it. Some items, I would send back, but I am not up to dealing with this today. Shame on those who charge “new” prices for used items. Having noted the condition, I plan to update the review after the cubes have been washed and/if I use them on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizers
customer_reviews.text: In packing for a 7 day trip, I had limited space in my carry on and someone suggested these as organizers. What a find! I was able to get all my dresses, shoes, under garments, workout clothes etc in each bag and each bag fit in the carry on like a perfect puzzle. the larger bag on one side, the smaller compartments on the other. Because they are flimsey, at first I wondered how they would work, as I began to pack them I saw they expanded. This helped my packing and helped me not to over pack. I could still fit other items around the side. I have never put a suitcase together so easily! wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: These Packing Cubes Don't Hold Their Shape
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are made of very thin material and don't hold their shape. I have been using a set of Eagle Creek packing cubes for years and they have made packing a breeze for me. Was hoping to add a few extra and tried the AmazonBasics version. Since these cubes don't hold their shape, you are essentially trying to fit lumpy bundles into your suitcase. It also wrinkles the clothes more. I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for family trips
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think I would need packing cubes - seemed like one more thing to pack! But a family trip to Orlando changed my mind. I loved being able to pack swim suits into one cube, underwear into another, girl clothes into a third, etc. When we arrived I just put each cube in a drawer and didn't have to waste time sorting or organizing our clothing. I also bought a set from Land's End but I like the Amazon ones a bit better because the dual zippers allow me to pack it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Was falling apart on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The medium sized back arrived with the mesh window pulling away from the main compartment already (about a 2 inch rip). I opted to return them and went with another brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best travelling product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a flight attendant for over 35 years - how did I not find this product before now????? I just worked my first trip with these and I am so amazed at how awesome they are! These kept me so organized throughout my trip. I can't imagine travelling again without them. Packing and repacking for my weekly trips has become so much easier. A place for everything and everything in its place :-) These are also great quality, especially for the price. Do not hesitate to purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with these makes suitcase organizing easier
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I traveled before packing cubes. I somewhat dimly remember digging through my suitcase every morning, looking for socks. And having to dig everything out to find them. With packing cubes, all my shirts go in one cube, my socks and underwear in another, my pants or shorts in a third. I even put my, ahemmmm, dirty clothes in another. It is so much easier to find what I'm looking for with packing cubes. Some of the packing cubes in this set are a bit small, so I haven't used them all yet. But the concept is proven and I really like the quality of these AmazonBasics cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Marty B

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for organized packing!
customer_reviews.text: These zip packing cubes are great! You can roll up & squash a lot into each one. It helps keep your luggage organized especially if you have to "live out of a suitcase" for a bit. I was skeptical it would really be worthwhile, but in the smaller ones I was able to roll up 2 weeks worth of undergarments, bras, socks & nightgowns. The mid size & larger ones were perfect for tops & shorts. If TSA had to open my bag everything was in perfect order! Want to buy more for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: You can't travel without these!
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live without these?! Packing cubes helped me organize my clothes when I packed - socks, exercise clothes, DS's clothes, my shirts, etc. and also minimize the amount of space they take up in my suitcase. Unpacking is also easier when I arrive - give everyone in the family the cube with their clothes. :D These seem pretty well made and the zippers close smoothly. The seams have held up even when the cubes are pretty full. The large size is the one I use least, except when travelling with kids. The other 3 sizes are great for solo travellers.
customer_reviews.author: plc

customer_reviews.title: Great way to live out of your suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Love these packing bags. Well made, light weight. Really helpful when you are living out of a suitcase, by organizing all of your stuff, and helping to keep everything nearly wrinkle-free. I roll up all of my clothes into these, including pants and dress shirts, and they end up with fewer wrinkles than folding. These bags are not too tall, so I can stack them 3 high in my suitcase. I measured my suitcase first, and bought a variety of sizes that fit perfectly. By living out of these bags, when it is time to leave, you are already half packed.
customer_reviews.author: ollie

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but bad quality better to look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought these packing cubes back in July of 2018 and barely used them a handful of times and one of them already has a hole because the stitching came loose.I have a laptop bag from AmazonBasics,that's held up well over the years,but these things aren't even the same quality.The only place they look to be double stitched at all,is the piece that connects the handle to the rest of the cube,other then that,all the seams appear to be single stitched,which is just a bad design choice. Packing cubes are nice to have when you need them I guess but I'd definitely go with a different brand and save $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last-minute as I was struggling with packing and a friend recommended them. The only color available next-day was red. They really worked and made my suitcase much more organized and I'll never leave home without them! They are lightweight but you can really cram stuff in there. I had no problem with the zippers, they were smooth and easy to use even when the cubes were bursting. I wish they came in a less utilitarian style, their appearance is more like camping equipment, but I'm very happy with the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Would buy separately
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the cubes several times this past summer and liked them, but did not find the sizes equally useful. I really like the medium and small one. I haven’t found a good use for the narrow rectangular one and the big one is only a few inches smaller than the carry-on suitcase, so I didn’t see the point, although I suppose it would be useful if you were trying to compress a bulky sweater. Otherwise, they seem well made. I’m considering buying additional small and medium ones.
customer_reviews.author: O. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: This kit is perfect for packing a backpack
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for packing a backpack. Each backpack pocket is usually a different size and the differing sizes of the cubes allow you to organize the different items for a weekend trip. Most organized trips I've had in a while. While traveling I am able to quickly get to my needed items without having to open or dig around in multiple pockets. At the hotel pulled out clothing bag and toiletries. When packing for multiple stop trips with larger suitcase I use these these smaller sizes with a few large cubes, a large cube will hold a couple days of clothes。 I also transport laundy in these and just toss them in to the washer with the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: wrc

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel organization!! A definite must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about 6 months now, and I have to say that they're great! These really help with organization in your luggage. For shorter trips, I use the large one to place all of dirty clothes so that they're all in one place. The only issue is that they're somewhat flimsy, but they work great otherwise. Hope they last over time, but at this price, I've already gotten my money's worth! Nice one, AmazonBasics!
customer_reviews.author: Josho4

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, effective, work great
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using package cubes for inside my big checked bag. These work great! I don't use the full set, only 3 of them. But I'm extremely happy with the approach to packing, and will use them forever. These are not fancy or sturdy. They're extremely lightweight, half-mesh, half-nylon. No clue how long they'll last. But they weigh almost nothing and work exactly as expected. For the price, these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at convenience. ..
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the first use was to take hubby for open heart surgery and a 7 day stay that turned out to be weeks. Nurses and aids liked the organization (genes in large cube, shirts in medium, socks in oblong, underwear in oblong, etc) of the cubes. I only took a cube home for laundry and returned with clean clothing. (Not suitcase) a great convenience.
customer_reviews.author: ETet

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The sizes of these are very nice. And I like the netting design so you can see what's inside (although a variety of colors would be even simpler -- blue for one thing, orange for something else, and so on). The quality, however, is not great. Used twice and from the beginning the zippers felt like they were about to get snagged and/or tear off. After the first use one of the cube's netting was torn from the stitching. Clearly these are poorly made and I would not recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: The best travel item ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to buy these for the longest time based on other platform’s reviews but I have to admit I was nervous thinking it was going to be a fail. Oh boy I just wish I had bought them sooner!!! I’ve travel 3 times already and every time I find them so incredibly practical and helpful to organize my clothes. No more mess Or stress trying to figure out the best way to pack all I need and more. The different sizes helps to categorize the type of clothes I have and find them fast. Also I feel they make your bag weight less.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid mathwig

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are just like they are described. I don't think they'll last forever, but they are certainly durable enough for the infrequent traveler. I use them for 1-2 weeks about once a month, and I find them very helpful in my double-sided hard shell suit case. They really are a must-have for the hard-shell suitcases since everything falls out unless you keep both sides zipped all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous make your life easier packing organization.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful organization tool for packing. Every family member has their own color for immediate identification of their stuff. Unpacking...just throw that person's colored cubes in their drawer. Need something out of the suitcase? Instead of rummaging around & messing everything up just pull out one cube & the rest of the suitcase stays wonderfully in order! These are a GAME CHANGER! I will never travel without them again. I can't speak to the longetivity of the product as have only used them for one trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Quality packing assistance, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these on a whim before going on a small vacation. I was a bit skeptical, but they really made the packing experience (before leaving and also before returning home) much more organized. I do recommend getting this assorted pack first, before getting any of the one-size packs, as the different sizes played different roles well (slim for underwear, small for socks, etc). Quality and durability seem great. We also liked the mesh top so we didn't have to try to remember what was where, and because it allowed everything to still breathe even if zipped up inside a packing block. We purchased two packs and will likely purchase more. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh&Kevin Kelly-Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Liked the color (sky blue) and variety of these bags
customer_reviews.text: Liked the color (sky blue) and variety of these bags. Fit a lot more clothes than I was expecting when I used them for the first time. Zippers are sturdy. The longer cube is pretty small--only really fit my unmentionables, but that worked for me. Then the other cubes I used for bottoms, tops and dresses for a trip when i packed my carryon for a trip. Good quality bags and kept me organized when I packed using these. Squeezed the air out of them once full and then unzipped a little to put a few more pieces in each when packing.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good set to keep organized
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and need to be prepared for all kinds of weather. These packing cubes help save me time and space in what could be an overstuffed luggage. The long piece is a little awkward but still useful for socks, underwear, neckties. Been using these for 3 years now and they're all still in good shape! Had to buy another set for my boyfriend to help him better organize his stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: My family of 4 is getting ready for a week long road trip, and we tend to overpack, so I got two sets of these for my kids to try and stay organized. My husband and I already had some from another brand, so I was able to color coordinate cubes for each person. I’m amazed and what they can hold, and they seem to be of comparable quality to the more expensive brand we already had. My only complaint is that I wish you offered more colors and the option to just get individual cubes as needed vs an entire set. I’d like to be able to add an extra medium cube to each of my kids sets.
customer_reviews.author: Linzh7

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of these packing sets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as gifts for 3 sister inlaw's when we were heading to Alaska for family wedding/vacation. I bought a couple sets for son and daughter inlaw for Xmas and, well of course, I bought myself a couple sets... Love the convenience of these packing sets. They fit perfect in my luggage making it very easy to find what I need by lifting out a cube rather then digging through clothes to get to the bottom and then needing to refold everything. Zippers work well and handle is an extra that I didn't even know I needed. Material holds up well. My dog does not seem to like these. He senses I will be away. :'(
customer_reviews.author: TJoT

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite travel accessories
customer_reviews.text: These made our international trip so much easier and more organized. Not only did it save clutter, but when luggage’s we’re getting full at the end of the trip, it was quick and easy to trade our clothes between suitcases to make more room. The zipper held up great and never seemed to snag on the clothes or itself. They were amazingly the perfect length to maximize the space in the luggage. The black mesh did well to help me identify what was in each but not so much to make it always to open them up in the airport to grab chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, great packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: Good: Good build quality with excellent zippers. Ventilated, easy to see what's inside. Materials are durable, zippers function well without catching. Excellent value compared to other offerings on the market. Bad: Nothing really. Meh: There are lighter options, but these retain their structure very well.
customer_reviews.author: chefpalatini

customer_reviews.title: Great packing solution!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great intro to using packing cubes. Love them! I have since purchased more in certain sizes that work for the family. I used to over-pack for a trip, and now I know what fits in each one, and that's enough! No more bringing too much or too little, really simplifies the process. Packing up to go home is easy. if it is a short stay, I can throw the bags into drawers without them, and my belongings are always organized and easy to find. Cant imagine traveling without them now! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Genius
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in my backpack over a 3 week vacation on the advice of a coworker and they were So worth it. Having things be compartmentalized in my bag made it 100x easier to find things instead of my worst nightmare -having everything vomit out of my bag every time I opened it. I was able to fit 4 pants, 3 shorts, 3 rompers, a light sweater, and some other small items just in the large cube. I liked the variety pack so I could separate clothing items based on the size of the cube; I will probably use these every time I pack a bag from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These cubes are a great way to organize your suitcase
customer_reviews.text: These would have gotten 5 stars if the zipper on one of the bags wasn't already broken the first time I tried to use them. The seam just came undone and I couldn't get the zipper past a certain point. These cubes are a great way to organize your suitcase, but they are pretty cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: More helpful than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used the packing cubes for more than six months. I've been surprised how helpful they are. The four different sizes make it easy to find the right cube for the need, and they definitely compact clothes so they pack into a smaller bag. I was surprised how much help the organization of using the cubes provides when traveling over just having everything in the bag. I definitely recommend using cubes when traveling, and these have worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the $20 to keep some order to the travel clothing, gear. The mesh cover helps you keep inventory and the configuration should all fit in a travel sized overhead luggage or like backpack. Good idea for a gift for those international travelers you know, as I am thinking this is a good idea for my brother as a gift as well. Good construction. I got the neon green. Fabric looks good, zipper pulls effective.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not deep enough
customer_reviews.text: These have good length, but are lacking in depth. If they were about half to one inch deeper, then they would be great, but they are too shallow. The color was a little darker grey than pictured as an FYI. I found another brand at a local store that I much prefer due to the depth, but I can use these for my toddlers clothes, as those don't require the same depth. Zipper and bags are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Traveled with these for a month using a carry-on
customer_reviews.text: This cubes are a game changer! Me and my wife have used these to travel packing only a carry-on for a complete month. We had other packing cubes before, but the zippers on those ended up tearing away, but not these bad boys. The zippers seem strong and the materials durable, forcing your clothes to compress just a little bit to the shape of the cube, so that you can fit more in a small space. We've recommended these to our whole family, and hope that they listen!
customer_reviews.author: Cone

customer_reviews.title: Great packing tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in an effort to keep my suitcase and clothes better organized on long trips. They do a great job of keeping things from getting to wrinkled up and tossed around on the airplane. Based on other reviews I went with a light color in case of rain (some talked about dark colors bleeding onto clothes if they got wet). I used the rolling method for putting my shirts in these and they came out beautifully! I'm definitely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LibAnne

customer_reviews.title: useful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I went to Seattle for eight days with only a carry-on. I read the reviews that bright colors bleed, so I bought the pale grey and they were great. I was able to pack everything I needed into a small suitcase tidily and efficiently. I've used them since for other trips and they have held up well. I also like that I can fold them all up and store them in one of the small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: but they had a really bad smell when I got them
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for my trip to keep things organized, but they had a really bad smell when I got them. I aired them out for days, but that didn't help so I ended up washing them. They still had a slight chemical odor after washing, but it was better than it was. I had no trouble with zippers, etc., and it was nice to be able to see through the top so that I knew what was in them!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Packing cubes are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I learned the value of packing cubes during my last 4-week overseas trip! I bought the other Amazon Basic 4-pack, with varying sizes. While they are extremely useful for my overall travel needs, I also wanted small travel cubes to use for my carry on, as well as one for my day pack (to put my phone charger, camera, cables and lenses). These are fantastic for keeping your suitcase, carry-on and day packs organized. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, flexible and multiple size packing cubes!
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot for our vacations. One of the major issues during travel is packing. These individual cubes are very useful for packing. Well, someone might ask why do you need additional packing materials in a suitcase? - These packing cubes help to keep the luggage neat, and in order. - Everything is tight and properly packed witin specific compartment. - It can compress clothes and pack much more. - I can take out individual cubes and find my stuffs in the same order when initially packed Also, the packing material is good quality, and durable! I really like these packing cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: These Are The Madonna Of Packing Cubes
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest things ever if you travel often! They allow you to separate your clothes and laundry and other items into sections which makes it incredibly easy to find what you're looking for. No more rummaging through every piece of clothing you have to find that charger or razor or pair of shorts. I once was lost and now - thanks to packing cubes - I am FOUND!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing orderly and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I always fear packing for trips, but these cubes make it easier. Just as the old saying about getting a big project done, "just put one foot in front of the other," they help me "compartmentalize" they way I think about packing. When living out of a suit case, I have often suffered from how disorganized my suit cases always get. These cubes help keep order. These change the way I pack and live during travel.
customer_reviews.author: YasBean

customer_reviews.title: More useful than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I travel all the time for work and often just use a carry on. Because of airlines getting more strict about carry-one luggage, i have switched to a backpack instead of a roller board. These cubes keep my clothes organized and neat. Also, once I get where I'm going, I use one of them for dirty laundry and that way I can keep them separate so I can wash just my dirty clothes when I get home and not have to try to remember what I wore and what I didn't. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets and split between my wife and myself on 2 weeks overseas trip to Asia. My wife originally did not want to use cubes, but now she is sold now because she said she was able to find things easily. The large cube fits well in our Ebag 21in TLS carry on. We use large for our rain jacket, down jacket. Med size for shirts and pants, small for rolled underwear, the long one for socks. Likes: light weight compared to some other products, zippers seems quite okay, grey color, price Dislikes: none (hope they last for some time)
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tseng

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in time to use them for a girls weekend to Florida. I was a little doubtful at first as to how these could possibly improve my packing capabilities, but decided to give them a try. They enabled me to fit an unholy amount of clothes into my carry-on. Based on other reviews mentioning that dye from some of the other color cubes ran onto their clothes,, I purchased the gray. No issues. High quality and a total game-changer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight- for compression & organization
customer_reviews.text: Now having used these for over 3 dozen extended travel trips for 2 years, I won't leave home without them. They do a great job of compression when needed, and the material, thread, zippers have held up with no issues whatsoever. They make it so easy to find items, and quickly transfer to a drawer when that option is available (i.e. condo or RV). I do augment this set with an Eagle Creek shirt sleeve folder for shirts/blouses and find that's all I need. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsers

customer_reviews.title: Will Never Pack without Packing Cubes Again
customer_reviews.text: I had never used packing cubes before. But I am now obsessed and will use them for every trip. These sizes were great. I was able to fit everything I needed for a 2 week trip to europe (which included a wedding) in these and it made repacking to move on to our next location a breeze. The medium size and small sizes are probably the most useful and wouldn't mind having another set of each of those. The large is slightly too big
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W

customer_reviews.title: Bought them all and very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These are so helpful in keeping everything organized when you are on a long trip. I have been traveling every month and find I always have just the correct amount of clothing due to being able to see what I have packed. These are a one time expense which pay off every time you need to pack. You will not regret investing in the small size cube packing set and consider the medium and large sets also. Bought them all and very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sun4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Will never travel without them
customer_reviews.text: I thought travel cubes were gimmicky... and then I traveled with them. I was an idiot. these things are amazing. I ordered a second set. The blue is a little darker then the photo, but is eye catching and you wont lose it. Ordered the green set as well. Just as nice and a great color. The material wears well and does not have any funny odors when they arrived. I have not needed to wash them, so not sure how they would wash. But the fabric is like a tent-like/non-rip material so I'm sure it would wash and air dry quickly if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: An efficient way to pack!
customer_reviews.text: My friend has told me that she packs her suitcase by rolling up her clothes. I tried it and it didn't work until I found these great packing cubes! The assortment of cube sizes was perfect and they were clearly well designed to fit into the carry-on size suitcase as well as larger suitcases. The net top makes it easy to see what is in the cube. I was amazed at how many articles of clothing I could put into each cube. If you roll the clothes carefully, they come out without too many wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organized travel
customer_reviews.text: I recently took a vacation overseas where we changed hotels every single night and was also doing horseback riding (smelly clothes) so this packing system was a godsend to keep clothes separate and make it easy to pack and unpack every day. Would absolutely recommend this. I was able to pack two weeks of clothes in a carry on sized wheelie bag including my riding boots and all thanks to this system.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Von Pants

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of this item just so I'd have options when packing. This packing set does indeed make packing and unpacking easier. Just don't confuse these with compression packing solutions, these aren't. If you over pack these bags, they will burst. These are not heavy duty. Pack them light and reasonably. I have no regrets or complaints packing a week's worth of clothes in these to fit in an carry-on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Stores really well (smaller ones folded up into larger ones, etc. and large one folds up easily also -- so, expandable as storage is needed -- can fit into each other or used as 4 separate luggage items and/or can fit into larger harder shell check in or carry on suitcase (these are quite flexible, so thinner material & can't be used for check in but fit nicely into larger check in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: c0l0rad0red

customer_reviews.title: Use it for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and yes it saves a lot of room on the suitcase.. should have bought this long time ago and would have saved me so extra suitcases. Not only for traveling but for storing clothes too, it saves room
customer_reviews.author: Danny Buezo

customer_reviews.title: Great cubes for organizing luggage
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be great. However, keep in mind that others have had problems with the colors bleeding. I bought the grey to reduce the chances that this would be a problem. I also washed them before use. So far they've been great and I haven't had any color bleeding issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight basics to separate contents of luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Flexible and collapsible to squeeze into luggage. Nice to separate stuff when traveling. If I buy again I will look for one with a wider outside strap so it can slide onto suitcase handle for stuff that doesn’t fit- or items I need to leave out when I go through security TSA. I would also like a couple that have more stiffness to them so I can have a stable spot to prevent wrinkling better. These work well for basics though! Nice to have vents so clothes breath.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: Misleading color in photos
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly not "sky blue" It's more like a turquoise. It's much darker than the photos provided. I haven't used them yet - will update the review once I have done so to provide more info on packability, durability etc. In the photo, you’ll see a real “sky blue” jacket folded up in this bright blue packing cube marketed as “sky blue.”
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy system to keep an orderly suitcase for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today but I am glad I opted for the 4 different sizes rather than 2 large and 2 medium. I will be traveling and living out of my suitcase for a 3 week vacation and being able to keep my various types of clothes separate will go a long way in keeping my belongings manageable in and out of hotels. They are lightweight, zippers seem good, they open almost all around with 2 zippers, a mesh top to be able to easily see what's inside and they even have a small handle which is a nice touch although I'm not sure I will use that. Can't wait to start packing, reallty!
customer_reviews.author: Bev K.

customer_reviews.title: These packing cubes are the best thing ever for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are the best thing ever for traveling! I was always hesitant about purchasing packing cubes because I didn't think they would really make a difference. However, I love how organized my suitcase is now, and believe it or not, I actually find I can pack more in my suitcase with these cubes. They're quite sturdy. I've taken them on two trips now, both of which I stuffed these cubes. None of them tore and the zippers are all still intact.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could buy them separately
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback? You have to buy them in a set. You cannot buy just one by itself. So the small is too small, the extra large too large, and the large size one that I would love to buy just one more of. But you can't. Only in sets of 4 -- I don't need four more large ones. Please, Amazon, break these out for separate purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I didn't know I even needed these - but they have totally changed the way I travel! I bought these really to corral my dirty clothes after a trip, but then I started using them to break out my PJs, fancy clothes, 'day of travel' clothes, etc. and it's been awesome! These cubes really help you save space (allowing you to bring more, haha) and help to organize your suitcase. This is one of my FAVORITE 'must have' travel accessories! Also, these cubes have been really sturdy - I'm really hard on zippers, packing, etc. and they've held up for about 10 or so trips I've taken around the country. No zipper issues or anything! Very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Better organization. Neater suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these packing cubes to keep my underwear and socks and misc items together. I ended up using all of the cubes. My suitcase looks a lot neater. They don't save space but are good for organization. They don't hold their shape without items in them, but something that does would probably add too much weight. When I get home from a trip, I store items I only use for traveling in one of the cubes so I remember to bring them on the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: T Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product for Less Money
customer_reviews.text: I use packing cubes a great deal and these are a good value. I'd rate them as comparable to the name brand cubes I have used heretofore for far less money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Great for staying organized with multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality for the price. Durable material and zippers. These will not "compress" your clothes but will help you be more organized. Typically when packing my son's (3,7) I fold and roll up their t shirts, pants. and shorts. In an effort to keep things looking nice and easy to unpack I did not do that with the cubes. Instead I folded them nicely. Two boys, 7 days, in warm weather took up one half of a 29" hard suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot of stuff and keeps it organized
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little pack organizers. I was able to fit 10 days worth of clothing in this set (10 pair of socks, 10 pair of underwear, and clothes) to organize my 40L backpack for my 2 country vacation. Highly recommend. This also made it useful to take out a small amount of clothing when the airliner weighed our bags.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any kind of traveler, even for crashing at a friend's house.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely life changing for even the most infrequent traveler. Perfect for an overnight stay at a friend's house (just pack one cube), or a full on trip. I love being able to pack my cubes and then just putting them in my luggage. This is especially helpful if airport security has to inspect your luggage. Everything is in cubes so nothing gets messy or disorganized. It's one of the best purchases that I've ever made. Hard to believe that something so simple can have such a big impact on your life.
customer_reviews.author: yg332

customer_reviews.title: Packing Cubes - Can't Live Without Them!
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't discovered packing cubes yet, you have to give them a try. When you arrive at your destination unpacking takes 90 seconds. I appreciate that at the end of a long trip!
customer_reviews.author: glrudd

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing baby clothes in a suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Great for packing baby clothes in a suitcase! I use the smaller sizes for socks, bibs, washcloth, etc and the larger for baby clothes, blankets, etc. I also bought a second set for regular clothing! My husbands shirts fit well in the larger ones and the smaller are great for underwear, socks, etc. I've actually been able to pack an entire weekends's worth of my own clothes (a few sundresses, shorts, tops, underwear and bras) in a single large one! Makes unpacking at a hotel so much easier! When not in use, they barely take up any space as I'm able to store 2 packs (8 total) within the smallest one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I like these cubes, they do a good job. Well made, good quality zippers, sizes worked for my needs. I had never used packing cubes, and they really do make a difference. So much easier then pawing thru all the contents looking for that one item. I am a one bag carry on traveler and I think these were lightweight but sturdy enough, good price point. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Very light. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic for the price. Couldn't be much happier with them. Fabric is rugged. Different sizes but all useful sizes. My wife is genuinely impressed. I used to be one of those people whose hotel room look like my suitcase stuff had exploded everywhere. So she's thrilled. It's the small things in life people
customer_reviews.author: AAF

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never knew these existed until friends suggested I use them on a group tour, changing locations almost everyday. It was an easy way to organize my clothes according to day of planned use, keep underwear and toiletries separated, and be able to reorganize throughout the trip as clothes got dirty. The bags are fabric with mesh tops. I thought I was able to get more items into my suitcase with less trouble and keep things organized during the trip.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Good option when going the cube route
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that I really needed or would find these packing cubes beneficial, but I am a convert! They keep you organised, and more importantly make unpacking/packing so easy when you are moving on every couple of days. Materials/zippers seem OK - have only used them on one 2 week trip so can't comment on durability. Good value when you compare to what's out there. They pretty much fill up a carry on when packed full.
customer_reviews.author: CRF Vancouver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Packing Cube !!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Amazon Basics Packing Cube and it's well made and attractive. Light weight. Used this for my recent trip to Germany, UK, France, Italy and Switzerland. This thoughtfully designed set with four different options can fit in just about any baggage and zippers are very well made.This is now my go-to cube for all my business trips. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bharani

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with these
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with these. I'm known to be an excessive packer and always have trouble fitting all the things I want to bring with me on my trips into carry-on sized luggage. However, with these packing cubes, I am able to efficiently pack my clothes and still have room to spare. My friends and family have seen me use these and have ordered them for their own use. The mesh is sturdy and has yet to rip on me despite many uses. The material is soft and pliable, so it can be easily folded up and stored.
customer_reviews.author: Kieu Duyen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not meant for heavy travel
customer_reviews.text: As far as price goes, these packing cubes are fantastic however if you’re a professional traveler don’t expect them to last long. I’ve had mine for less than two months and two of the four have already torn at the seams. If you travel two or three times a year, these will do fine; if you’re like me and take two to three trips a week, pass on them and go with a known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without these cubes!
customer_reviews.text: These cubes make packing for travel so much simpler. I'm a decent packer, but after a few days on the road everything inevitably gets jumbled around in my suitcase. These cubes keep everything organized and easy to find. I prefer traveling with smaller, carry-on sized suitcases, and these stack and fit perfectly. The small- and medium-sized cubes (middle two sizes in the 4-piece set) are the most useful for me. I'm planning on buying a few extras of those sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nate B.

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a convert to packing cubes. I travel a lot, and these cubes are just what I needed. When packing, I spread out everything on the bed that I'm going to take on the trip. Then I pack like with like. Socks and undies, for example in the long skinny bag. Shirts in one rectangle. Trousers in another. Jackets in the big bag. Then when I get to my destination, I put the first three cubes into a drawer, and hang the jackets. Hey, presto, everything's unpacked, and I know where everything is. Love them. And they store neatly, folded up inside one of the rectangles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with overall quality, but one packing cube slightly different color.
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality looks good. Zippers work well. I have not traveled with them yet, so not sure how they hold up. One of the four packing cubes in the set I received was a slightly different shade of material from the other three. Not a big deal, but reflects on the overall QC of the product from Amazon's supplier. Would have probably given 5-stars if not for this small issue. Only plainly noticeable when they are together as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Oh-Well-Darn

customer_reviews.title: Better than excpected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. These gadgets allow doubts get more into a suitcase than the 'toss in' method. I have actually made two overnight trips (two nights each on both occasions) with just the two smaller ones inside the large one (no suitcase). I might get a second set of smaller ones for better compartmentalization.
customer_reviews.author: Benzimidazolone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and machine washable
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect traveler organizer cubes. They're lightweight, easy to store and machine washable. Most other traveler cubes are inconveniently not machine washable and I specifically bought these cubes after quite a bit of research because they are super easy to clean. Washed them once already and they're holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for organizing items within the bag
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for organizing items within the bag. I don't think they help with saving the most amount of space but theya re awesome for organizing. It was easy to have toiletries in one, everyday outfits in another, undergarments in the other and then socks in one. I realized I didn't really need all four of them but three were perfect. I totally recommend this for traveling where you are trying to get around quickly.
customer_reviews.author: crayola3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, extremely useful packing tool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple different packing cube sets, but this was my favorite and the one I kept. Sizes are really useful (considering getting a second set of smaller ones, too) and I've used the packing cubes on trips, to the gym, and anywhere that I want to keep more than 1 type of item organized. The zippers are great, open easily without catching on sides, and the fabric and mesh are durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: I really like this concept
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concept. I'm not particularly fond of the quality of the material - the zippers seem a little flimsy but I really do like them at first blush. I will see how they travel for a little while to see if they hold up. Otherwise, right now, I like them. Update - Zippers have held up so far. They are deceivingly roomy. An upgrade in the material would make these phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: These are nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. They allow me to pack my clothes neater and keep my suitcase contents organized. Arriving at my destination, my shirts were less wrinkly after being packed in these than they had been when I packed without the cubes. While away from home for an extended period, I used them to keep clean clothes separate from dirty clothes. They were also great for organizing power adapters, cords, and electronics. I bought two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Great packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for the perfect packing cube. I have 3 different sets, all used slightly differently. These are not as lightweight as some but love the multi sizes - for putting everything in a suitcase like pieces of a puzzle. These appear well made. Recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Martin

customer_reviews.title: I will never pack again without these
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Lightweight. Multiple sizes. I saved so much room in my suitcase that I repacked and went to a smaller size. If you are traveling with a backpack these are a must. No digging around for what you need. Just pack items in categories and slide them in the order you may need them. Great for Air travel!
customer_reviews.author: buggsy

customer_reviews.title: No clutter and easy to pack and organize your stuff ! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great in organizing your clothes. No clutter and keeps your folded clothes neat and not bulky! Easy to pack and just put on the drawer with the easy handle and unzip and you're done unpacking! No need to take out your stuff from this! The only thing I would likw to suggest in order to improve the product is if they can put a little plastic to insert a paper so you can put your own labels on each bag this way you can write the weight of each bag and what's inside of it. Just like what i did on the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop!

customer_reviews.title: Great packing cubes -- light grey
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubs made packing for my international trip simple and efficient. Not only are helpful for organizing clothing (underwear, tops, pants, activewear, jackets), but they fit perfectly into a carryon luggage. The zippers worked well and did not snag. While some reviewers have mentioned the dye bleeding from their packing cube sets, I ordered my set in light grey and have not seen any discoloration/bleeding when these bags became wet. Overall, this is a great buy and I would stay away from the brightly colored versions.
customer_reviews.author: Truth_words

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this set of packing cubes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT set. I bought it as our trunk was so full we did not have room for suitcases so thought I would pack things individually in these packing cubes and it worked beautifully. When I needed bath items I grabbed the appropriate case, same with clothing, night wear, and I used the last one for maps, tourist information, receipts, reservations, etc. It was great to know that everything was together and I just had to "grab and go". Each pack had a handle so it was easy to grab and carry it. I actually left the toilet items in their case for overnight visits to the grandchildren. I will probably buy another set for future travel.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: I have the most rectangle shaped one to be the least useful, and found I liked the more square cubes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first use of any type of packing cube set and I have used it twice in the past 2 months. I appreciate that I can group clothing types together, and place used laundry in a cube separate from the rest of my clothing. I have the most rectangle shaped one to be the least useful, and found I liked the more square cubes a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Essential for travel
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE for these cubes! They are the perfect way to keep organized, and they help with both packing AND unpacking. I put different types of clothing in each one, so I can find things more easily when I’m unpacking at my destination. I told my friend with kids that she should get them in different colors, so she can easily separate her stuff and each of her kids’ stuff. These are just so simple, inexpensive, and I seriously don’t know why you WOULDN’T get them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing - mixed sizes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the variety, and love the two smaller sizes. The medium size is actually the most useful for actual packing of clothes - the smaller ones are good for holding "stuff" like shoes and chargers, but they are small for clothes. The large bag is really too big to be useful, and won't even fit in some of my suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So many pieces of different sizes! They're very lightweight and can be stuffed. Used these on a 16-day trip (11-night cruise and 5 days with family). Packed underwear, shirts, and tops in the larger ones and electronics in the smallest one. Packing cubes are the way to go. Keeps you organized.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about the idea of packing cubes, but it turns out these work really well. Clothes were wrinkle-free and it allowed me to better organize packing for trips. I travel mainly for business and these have quickly become a necessity for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 4 Piece Packing Travel Organizer Cubes Set, Black
feature_bullets: Double zipper pulls make opening/closing simple and fast
Mesh top panel for easy identification of contents, and ventilation
Soft mesh won't damage delicate fabrics
Webbing handle for convenience when carried by itself
Set includes 1 large (17.5 x 12.75 x 3.25 inches), medium (13.75 x 9.75 x 3 inches), small (11 x 6.75 x 3 inches), and slim (14 x 5 x 2.8 inches) AmazonBasics packing cube
Made of high-quality fabric with finished interior seams to increase durability
